title: Chronology WordPress Theme (Professional 2 Columns Theme)
description:
Chronology is a timeline-style WordPress theme with a masonry post display, a customizable and attractive design, and tons of great features. With Woocommerce support, optimizations for SEO and Adsense, and premium support, Chronology is a must-have theme for any blog.


Chronology Features:

Magazine Style
Chronology WordPress theme includes a sleek featured posts slider, and a dual column magazine layout.

Options Panel
Like all MyThemeShop themes, Chronology includes our custom options panel so you can customize your theme easily.

Integrated Social Media
Promote your site easily using the built in social media buttons, which allow your readers to help promote the content they like from your site.

Shortcodes
Add highlights and features to your posts with a click, using the shortcodes that are included in Chronology.

SEO Optimized
Google is becoming harder and harder for bloggers to deal with, but Chronology makes it simple to get top SEO rankings.

Speed
With lazy loading, optimized code and a clean design, Chronology will put all other themes to shame with its loading time.

Custom Widgets
Add sidebar widgets without having to use extra plugins. Chronology includes the most popular sidebar widgets that weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve customized for added power.

Related Posts
Get your users engaged, by showing them more posts and keeping them on your site for longer.

Ad Optimized
Maximize your advertising earnings and keep your readership happy at the same time, with ChronologyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s ad optimisation.

Featured Posts Slider
Show off your best posts with the slick featured posts slider, guaranteed to get more clicks from your readers.


Responsive
Chronology is 100% responsive, meaning it works on any browser or window size. No more tinkering with plugins or half-working themes.
